title: Manohari Emerald Bead Gulbandh with Rose Quartz Centerpiece
materials: Polki Diamonds. The gold has a traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster.
features: This exquisite gulbandh features five strands of meticulously hand-strung emerald beads. The centerpiece is a captivating rose quartz cabochon, surrounded by a halo of uncut Polki diamonds set in a traditional Kundan style. The setting showcases intricate detailing, indicative of skilled craftsmanship passed down through generations.
colors: White (Polki Diamonds). This classic combination exudes elegance and prosperity.
occasions: and other special occasions. Perfect for adding a touch of timeless elegance to both traditional and contemporary outfits. Suitable for brides seeking a unique and regal look.
description: This gulbandh is a testament to the enduring beauty of South Indian craftsmanship. The combination of vibrant emeralds, the soft blush of the rose quartz, and the brilliance of the Polki diamonds creates a piece that is both eye-catching and culturally significant. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and enhances the gold's richness. A unique heirloom piece, perfect for passing down through generations.
